addPluginToNova(address,uint256).details: Adds a plugin to a Nova.

params.pluginAddress: The address of the plugin contract.
params.pluginDefinitionId: The ID of the plugin definition.

editPluginDefinitionMetadata(uint256,str.details: Edits the metadata URI for a given plugin definition.

params.pluginDefinitionId: The ID of the plugin for which to edit metadata.
params.url: The URL of the new metadata.

getOwnerOfPlugin(address).details: Returns the owner of a given plugin.

params.pluginAddress: The address of the plugin for which to get the owner.

returns._0: The address of the owner of the specified plugin.

getPluginIdsByNova(address).details: Returns an array of token IDs representing the plugins installed for a given Nova.

params.Nova: The address of the Nova for which to get installed plugins.

returns._0: An array of token IDs representing the plugins installed for the specified Nova.

getPluginInstanceByTokenId(uint256).details: Returns the plugin instance associated with a given token ID.

params.tokenId: The token ID for which to get the plugin instance.

returns._0: A `PluginInstance` struct containing the plugin address and plugin definition ID associated with the specified token ID.

modulesRegistry().details: Returns the address of the Modules Registry contract.

returns._0: The address of the Modules Registry contract.

pluginDefinitionsInstalledByNova(address.details: Returns a boolean indicating whether a given plugin definition is installed for a given Nova.

params.Nova: The address of the Nova for which to check plugin definition installation.
params.pluginTypeId: The ID of the plugin definition for which to check installation.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the specified plugin definition is installed for the specified Nova.

params.LR: address of new default local reputation state and logic

setDefaulLRAddress(address).notice: changes the default local reputation globally

documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when a new plugin definition is added to the plugin registry.
 @param pluginTypeId The ID of the newly added plugin definition.

@dev Returns the address of the Modules Registry contract.
 @return The address of the Modules Registry contract.

@notice changes the default local reputation globally
 @param LR address of new default local reputation state and logic

@title IPluginRegistry
 @dev Interface for the plugin registry contract, which manages the registration and installation of plugins.
